website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Reflect Fit delivers Bluetooth audio with intense bass depth and bright highs—along with a built-in heart rate monitor.
pros: Powerful bass response matched with sculpted, bright highs
Easy to use heart rate monitor gives live results, can also sync with popular fitness apps
cons: Audio performance not for those seeking accurate mix
Extra secure fit might feel a tad uncomfortable/invasive for some users

customer_reviews.title: JBL, better than makes twice the price
customer_reviews.text: I am quite hard to please when it comes to audio or visual equipment, but I must say I am pleased with these headphones,they are the first Bluetooth headphones I've bought as they are quite expensive but these are worth every penny,and for in ear headphones the sound quality is pretty decent,they are comfortable and not to have the hassle of constantly having to adjust a cable is awesome,the battery life is good to considering the size of them,big fan of JBL as you get the same or better quality of makes like beats for less cost
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good and everything with 2 minor problems
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sounds great. For the price it's as good as it gets. Wire is not the strongest I have seen but with careful use it won't break for a long time. Battery is also quite good. 2 minor issues , 1)I expect these type of headphones to have magnets so they can stick together around your neck when you're not using them. This doesn't have that. 2) It charges via micro USB. It's not acceptable in 2020 ; we're in USB C era now. Other than that I think it's a good pair of headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vishwa Jayaratne

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 weeks use
customer_reviews.text: Earphones were good when they worked, but after about 6 weeks they refused to turn on or charge. This is my second pair of JBL earphones and the first pair also died on me last weekend after under a year of use. JBL customer service not able to help because I bought from an Amazon marketplace seller. Will be my last JBL product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't connect to it with my phone. Only my iPad. Returned it and got a new, still got the same problem. Plus I actually think the sound is better on the older version. At this price range, not worth it at all. It's has one of the worst sound, I have heard at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: excellent earphones
customer_reviews.text: my second pair of JBL earphones, using them since September 2019, mostly in the gym. Excellent sound quality, good battery life around 7-8 hours of loud music. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Tomski

customer_reviews.title: It says 10 hours but not??????????!!
customer_reviews.text: It says clearly the battery will last 10 hours but after 6 hours it says power off battery is 💀 dead .is it The company fault of the company is making us fool ...
customer_reviews.author: reed rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: No compatible with Google Pixel (1st generation)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these headphones seem to be no compatible with Google Pixel (1st generation). they would pair perfectly with iPhone 6 and Huawei phones but for some reason, I've been unable to pair them with a Google Pixel (1st generation) A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift and each time he uses them my husband gives a comment on how much he likes and uses them
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: So when does the battery runout...
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of kit - sound is excellent as long as you pop them in your ears correctly. battery life is amazing..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. PSG

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Be using for running really good stay in the ear when running, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Love these, easy to use, great quality sound, stay in when running
customer_reviews.author: miss s d green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed they aren't compatible with phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with a Huawei P30 which they will not pair with, they pair instantly with my Samsung but not my husband's phone and they were a gift for when he is running. Be aware and check compatibility when purchasing as when looking online looks like this is a widespread issue between JBL reflect and Huawei
customer_reviews.author: Kel M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with the oneplus phons
customer_reviews.text: Didn't connect to my oneplus. Known issue though no advertised. Waste of time ordering.
customer_reviews.author: revBlue

product_meta.title: JBL Reflect Mini 2 Lightweight Wireless Sport In-Ear Headphones – Earphones & Headset include Comfort Neckband for Exercise – IXP5-Rated Sweatproof – in Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Blue

JBL REFLECT MINI 2 HEADPHONES
Sports performance enhanced by a great music listening experience. Ergonomic, lightweight and elegant design means you will never
even have to think about wearing them while training. Fits perfectly to every form of sport, from running to cycling, to weight lifting,
with IXP5 sweatproof rating. In combination with long lasting battery life, for up to 10 hours of playtime on one charge, your workout
is set, ready to go. Performance wireless with a convenient reflective neckband for comfort and safety. Universal 3-button mic handles
volume, music and calls. Made to move like you can.

Product Details * Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones
 * Driver Size: 5.8mm Dynamic Driver
 * Frequency Response: 10Hz–22kHz
 * Connection: Micro USB cable for rapid charge
 * Bluetooth version: 4.2
 * Bluetooth transmitter frequency range: 2.402 – 2.480GHz
 * Battery type: Rechargeable Lithium Ion Cylindrical Cell (3.7V 2 x 85mAh)
 * Colour: Blue
 * Weight: 15g

JBL by HarmanFor over 70 years, JBL has engineered the most precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. Harman's mission
and vision is to make life more connected, entertaining, personalized and productive. The company combines passion and purpose
to design smart products systems, software and services to connect people wherever they are.

"

BOX CONTAINS
Reflect Mini 2 3 x Sizes of ear tips 3 x Enhancer Charging Cable Sport Carry Pouch 1 x Warranty / Warning (W / !) 1 x QSG / Safety Sheet (S / i)
feature_bullets: Introducing high performance, endurance in-ear sport earphones with safety light reflection / Stay by you through every workout - so you can focus on your next challenge
JBL Signature Sound to stay with you even during extreme training / IXP5-rated water and sweat-resistant, means the in-ear tips are prepared for intensive training sessions
Even if you are running on low, the JBL quality Lithium-ion battery keeps going long after you're finished: extra wireless Bluetooth streaming for up to 10 hours play on a single charge
Rugged & durable with ergonomic earbuds for an elegant appearance / 3-Button Remote for microphone drivers and handsfree voice assistant means it's never been easier to access music or calls
Items delivered: 1x Reflect Mini 2 Headphones in Blue / Ear Tips in 3 Sizes & 3x Earpiece Fit Enhancers / Charging Cable / Sport Carry Pouch / Warranty & Warning / Safety Sheet
